channel.title: Need total RSPS help
channel.description: Since I upgraded to Windows 8 NO SERVER &CLIENT has worked I mean NONE ive tried every single source that isn't taken down by Jagex. Alright now ill tell you what ive done. Ive went into Config changed the server name as well I went into Client.Java in the source folder and changed everything to my liking and the announcements. Whenever I go into the client folder and change the RSPS ip to mine of 72.2**.***.*** im not giving the rest, whenever I change it to mine I can no longer run my client and connect yet it says that my server ProEliteModding is online! can anyone offer any solutions yet it says on Canyouseeme.org that my ports are open. Ive never had this problem before can anyone offer any help?

item.title: Need total RSPS help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Team_Rocket:

You should also be aware that Windows 8 is pretty much infested with back doors for Microsoft and Law Enforcement. Everything you do on this Platform is monitored.

I second this.

If you must, run a virtual machine through Windows 8 and use Windows XP/7.

Read full topic

@aciraccar wrote:

Windows 8 Cannot Run Servers Yet I Suggest you Create a Vps Using VmWire or Java Oracle Box and try on that make sure you pick Os as Windows xp or 7 XD
